com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.recovery

Interface RecoveryPlanOverriderFactory


  • public interface RecoveryPlanOverriderFactory
    Implementations of this interface allow the overriding of behavior in the DefaultRecoveryPlanManager with a custom implementation that addresses applicaiton specific failure recovery mechanisms.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RecoveryPlanOverrider create(StateStore stateStore, java.util.Collection<Plan> plans)
      Returns a new RecoveryPlanOverrider which will be queried for custom overridden phases when task recovery occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        RecoveryPlanOverrider create(StateStore stateStore,
                             java.util.Collection<Plan> plans)
        Returns a new RecoveryPlanOverrider which will be queried for custom overridden phases when task recovery occurs.
        Parameters:
        stateStore - the state store being used by the service
        plans - all plans being used by the service, as of the time that the service is being initialized
